title: Better Soil Structure Better Planting: a Series with Kent Vlieger (1/7)

tasks.task: Understand the context and purpose of Kent Vlieger's field videos in May 2020.
subtasks: Recognize the wet conditions in South Dakota during 2019.
Note the impact of excessive precipitation leading to prevent planting and river flooding.
Consider the anxiety over potential repeat disaster in 2020 due to soil moisture.
Identify the goal of the videos: showcasing soil health practices in various stages.
Acknowledge the diversity of producers featured, from long-term to short-term soil health practitioners.

tasks.task: Assess the relevance for 2021 agricultural planning.
subtasks: Consider how the videos may assist producers in preparation for the upcoming season.
